Reviews.Title: Faulty unit, now cannot return! AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!
Reviews.Author: mgauss "mgauss"
Reviews.Content: When I got my unit directly from the manufacturer, the bolts to connect the base to the TV were missing.  The Jensen Company then sent replacement bolts that did not fit the model!  Technical support does not know the unit as it is new they don't even have a model there to compare.  And they won' t swap me for another one even though I reported the missing bolts.Bottom line Jensen send a defective incomplete products and I am out $ 500.AVOID SELLER AND JENSEN AT ALL COSTSI WOULD LOVE TO DELETE THIS REVIEW IF THEY TOOK CARE OF ME -- HERE'S HOPING

Reviews.Title: The Best Portable TV Made!
Reviews.Author: Scott Myhre
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these for my motorhome and couldn't be happier. I have a 26" for the living room and a 22" for the bedroom and both have a great picture and the audio is crystal clear. Being a 12 volt tv made me skeptical, but they draw very little power from my batteries and they out perform the 120 volt models in the house. I don't know about their service department because they both run flawlessly. As I said I am real happy with these tv's!

Reviews.Title: TV came with no bolts and does not work!
Reviews.Author: mgauss "mgauss"
Reviews.Content: The 6 bolts to connect the base to the body are missing.  TV does not work.  I was shipped a used TV that does not work.  I reported it early.  Now marketer will not let me exchange it for a new model.  Jensen tech support does not know this model cause "it is new."  Very dissapointed with my $ 500 paperweight.

Reviews.Title: can you hear me now??
Reviews.Author: dswiss
Reviews.Content: I have a 26 inch and a 19 incher in my motorhome. The picture quality is very good and functionality is good too. however, the sound of both of these sets is very poor. With the volume at max, I can barely hear it, and there is a lot of distortion. On the other hand, if I feed the sound through my on-board radio, the sound is fine, so I suspect that the speakers they use are rather poor!
